results.title: AMPK Phosphorylates LMX1b to Regulate a Brainstem Neurogenic Network Important for Control of Breathing in Neonatal Mice.
results.text_hl: These findings highlight the potential for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment and prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Apnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001049 @@@AOP@@@.

results.title: Sleep apnea is induced by a high-fat diet and reversed and prevented by metformin in non-obese rats.
results.text_hl: A great increase (+266 +/- 48%) in central @<m>DISEASE_Apnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001049 @@@apnea@@@ frequency was observed in insulin-resistant @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
